snippet: On Thursday, a United States district judge said the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences had failed to show that GoDaddy acted in bad faith.
abstract: United States District Court Judge Andre Birotte says Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences failed to show in its suit against domain registrar GoDaddy that it acted in bad faith by letting customers buy domain names
lead_paragraph: On Thursday, a United States district judge said the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences had failed to show that GoDaddy acted in bad faith.

headline.main: GoDaddy Prevails in Suit Over Oscar Domains
headline.print_headline: GoDaddy Prevails in Suit Over Oscar Domains

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
